message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe will be of great value to your business. While I can't disclose specifics at this time, I can assure you it's worth no less than $800000 to me. I'm confident you'll see the potential in it as well. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1000000. This is a significant opportunity to acquire a valuable asset. Let me know your thoughts.
